description.zh: 在线路径规划工具，支持多种路径规划算法，帮助用户快速找到最优路径。
description.en: Online path planning tool that supports multiple path planning algorithms, helping users find the optimal path quickly.

description.zh: 快速生成各种类型的二维码，支持文本、链接、WiFi等多种内容格式。
description.en: Quickly generate various types of QR codes with support for text, links, WiFi and other content formats.
